property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy 1 foundation: Choose a zone. For the rest of this turn, after you play an attack with the chosen zone, it gets +3 damage. E(4+): Your attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your high attacks get +2 damage. F: Draw 1 card. Your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: If the next card you play this turn is an attack, it gets +2 to the control check to play it, +2 speed and +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Change the zone of your attack to any other zone. E Commit: This weapon attack gets +2 damage or -2 damage (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, after a player plays an attack, that player must change that attack's zone to any other zone. R Commit: After your attack is blocked, discard the block from your opponent's card pool. Then draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards you've discarded during this attack's Enhance Step. E Discard 2 cards: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your opponent reveals their hand. You may change the zone of this attack to any other zone. E: If this attack deals damage, draw 2 cards. Only playable if your opponent has a greater hand size than you.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards with blocks in their hand. E Commit 1 foundation: Change this attack's zone to any other zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Change this attack's zone to any other zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack deals damage, destroy all assets. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: For the rest of this turn, if your attack is not blocked, it gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 2 cards: This attack's damage cannot be reduced by card effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you take 4 or more damage, draw 1 card. {All} R Commit 1 foundation: After you deal 5 or more damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent reveals their hand. Change the zone of your attack to any other zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, destroy 1 asset. {Fire} E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your attack gets a speed bonus, it gets +3 damage. R Commit: After your attack gets a damage bonus, it gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 speed. {Fire} E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Each player chooses a foundation in their opponent's staging area and turns it face down. These cards are considered to be foundations with a blank text box. E: If your attack deals damage, add it to your staging area face down as a blank foundation during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, face down cards in your card pool do not count towards your progressive difficulty. F Discard X momentum: Turn X cards in your card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo F: Draw 2 cards and then discard all cards from your card pool. F: Add all face down cards in your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add 1 face down card from your staging area to your hand. E Commit, discard 1 momentum. Each player turns 1 card in their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, after an attack deals damage, each player adds the top card of their deck to their card pool face down. E Commit: If your attack deals damage, turn it face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum. E: If this attack deals damage, turn 1 card in your card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, it is added to your staging area face down during the End Phase. This card is considered to be a foundation with a blank text box. Each of this attack's multiple copies also gains this enhance.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Ready all face down cards in your staging area that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +X speed. X equals the number of face down cards in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Powerful: 2. You must destroy face down cards in your staging area to pay this attack's powerful cost. E Commit 1 foundation: Take 1 card from your hand and add it to your staging area face down. This card is considered to be a foundation with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, add it to your staging area face down. This card is considered to be a foundation with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Destroy 1 face down card in your opponent's staging area. Only playable during your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy 2 foundations: Turn all face down cards in your staging area face up. Discard any attacks or action cards revealed by doing so.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Add this card to your card pool: Choose a face down card in your opponent's staging area and add it to their card pool. Taki R Discard 1 momentum: Before you clear this card from your card pool during the End Phase, add it to your staging area instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, each player adds 1 face down card from their staging area to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this foundation: Ready 1 card in your staging area that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your staging area face down and committed. This card is considered to be a foundation with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that adds any number of cards to either player's momentum, cancel that effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add 1 attack with a printed difficulty of 4 or less from your discard pile to your card pool. Only playable once per turn. R (+X): After your attack deals damage, add 1 foundation with a difficulty of X or less from your hand to your staging area, ready. X equals the damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your block modifiers get -2. E: Your attack gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card blocks a card with the multiple keyword, all multiple copies of that card are discarded. E: Switch this attack's speed and damage values.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card: If your attack deals damage, add 1 foundation from your hand to your staging area, ready. Xianghua F Destroy this asset: Take 1 card with a printed difficulty of 4 or less from your discard pile and add it to your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, after an attack gets a speed bonus, that bonus gets an additional +1 speed. E Commit: Discard 1 attack with a difficulty of 4 or less from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your attacks get -2 difficulty. Combo E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 foundation with a printed difficulty of 2 or less from your hand to your staging area, ready.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack deals damage, take 1 action card in your card pool and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, after another attack is played, switch its speed and damage values.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is added to your card pool, your opponent must reveal 1 random card in their hand and play with it revealed for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, all other attacks you play get +1 speed. Combo E: If this attack deals damage, each player adds all cards in their card pool to their hands.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, multiple copies of an attack get -3 damage. Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals this attack's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 attack from your card pool: Your next non-attack card this turn gets -X difficulty. X equals the control value of the discarded attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Ready any 2 foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Switch your attack's speed and damage. Only playable if you have at least 3 attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Choose 1 foundation. This attack gets +1 speed for each copy of the chosen card in each player's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Both players reveal 1 card from their hand. If the revealed cards are the same card type, this attack gets +3 speed. Only playable if both players have at least 1 card in hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After 1 of your foundations is destroyed due to your opponent's card effect, add 1 foundation with a difficulty of 2 or less from your hand to your staging area, ready. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the block modifier of your attack. E Commit: If you block this attack, your block gets Breaker: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, all block modifiers get +2. F: Your next attack this turn gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card as a block, discard it from your card pool. E: You opponent's attack gets -3 speed and -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +1 speed. E Commit: If you block this attack, you may play any attack with a printed speed higher than its printed damage as a reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, all block modifiers get +2. E Commit: This attack gets -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the total of all block modifiers in your card pool. E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 1 random card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +1 speed. Each multiple copy of this attack also gains this enhance.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if this attack has a higher speed than damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Take the top card from your discard pile and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack deals damage, the next card your opponent attempts to play this turn gets +X difficulty. X equals the damage dealt by this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack gets a speed bonus, change its zone to any other zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, it deals no damage during the Damage Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destory this foundation, discard 1 momentum: If your attack deals damage, add 1 other card in your card pool to your hand. Only playable if your attack has a higher speed than damage.

card.name: To the Ends of the Earth

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: If you completely block this attack, your block gets Breaker: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your attack played as a reversal deals damage, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals the total of all block modifiers in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you play a block, that card's block modifier gets -2. E (4+): Your attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent discards any number of cards due to a card effect, they lose X vitality. X equals the number of cards they discarded. E Commit 1 foundation: If your attack deals damage, your opponent discards X cards. X equals half the damage dealt (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your opponent draws or adds any number of cards to his hand due to a card effect, you draw X cards instead. X equals half the number of cards they would have drawn (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, after your opponent draws any number of cards due to a card effect, they must discard 1 card. F: Each player discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent draws any number of cards due to a card effect, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, after a player plays an attack, they must discard 1 card and then draw 1 card. E Commit: Your opponent must commit 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Discard 1 card: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose and discard 1 of the revealed cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Yoshimitsu E Lose 5 vitality: This attack is unblockable. Only playable if your opponent has at least 15 vitality. E: Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Commit your opponent's character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent draws any number of cards due to a card effect, they discard X cards. X equals half the cards your opponent drew (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent discards 1 or more cards due to a card effect, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Both players discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard X cards: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area with a difficulty of X or less.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets -3 damage. If it deals damage, your opponent loses 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 2 cards: If your non-throw attack deals damage, your opponent loses 4 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent loses vitality due to an attack or card effect, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your low attack gets +2 damage. F: Your next control check this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your opponent's next control check this turn gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your next control check this turn gets +3. E Commit 1 foundation: Your next control check this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next low attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your opponent discards 1 random card for each low attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your high attack gets +1 damage for each low attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack shares 2 or more resource symbols with your opponent's character, it gets -4 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack shares 2 or more resources symbols with your character, it gets +3 damage.
